entry.title: WINTER STORM WARNING , Daniel's Harbour
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 4:02 PM NST Thursday 12 January 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: -8.4°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Daniel's Harbour 4:30 PM NST Thursday 12 January 2023

Pressure / Tendency: 102.7 kPa rising
Humidity: 79 %

entry.title: Thursday night: Chance of flurries. Temperature rising to minus 5 by morning. POP 40%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 40 percent chance of flurries this evening. Wind southwest 20 km/h. Temperature rising to minus 5 by morning. Wind chill near minus 14. Forecast issued 4:00 PM NST Thursday 12 January 2023

entry.title: Friday: Chance of flurries. High minus 2. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 60 percent chance of flurries in the afternoon. Wind southwest 30 km/h gusting to 50. High minus 2. Wind chill near minus 13. Forecast issued 4:00 PM NST Thursday 12 January 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Snow at times heavy. Temperature steady near minus 2.
entry.summary: Snow at times heavy. Blowing snow over exposed areas overnight. Amount 15 to 25 cm. Wind southwest 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming light in the evening. Wind becoming northeast 30 gusting to 50 overnight. Temperature steady near minus 2. Wind chill near minus 9. Forecast issued 4:00 PM NST Thursday 12 January 2023
